title: Old Dad
cast_members: Mildred Harris|George Stewart|John St. Polis|Myrtle Stedman|Irving Cummings|Hazel Howell|Edwin Brown|Loyola O'Connor|Bess Mitchell|Tula Belle

media.title: Old Dad (1920) - 6.jpg

media.title: Old Dad (1920) - 3.jpg

media.title: Old Dad (1920) - 2.jpg

media.title: Old Dad (1920) - 1.jpg
media.caption: Film director Lloyd Ingraham and actress Mildred Harris meeting with the vice president of the Rock Island Railroad A. F. Gartz to obtain permission to use his estate as background in their film Old Dad (1920), on page 66 of the June 26, 1920 Exhibitors Herald.
media.attribution: Chaplin-Mayer Pictures Company / Associated First National Pictures
